Locations.Name: Elevator
Locations.Description: Exiting the elevator, you enter a well-lit underground garage with marked parking spaces, exit signs, and pedestrian walkways with safety stripes.

Locations.Name: Parking Exit
Locations.Description: A parking attendant slouches in a dingy booth next to the lowered gate. They look up and eye you. You can TALK to the ATTENDANT

Locations.Name: Parking East 1
Locations.Description: A shiny blue Tesla was parked, and a big puddle from a rusty pipe behind it blocked nearby parking spaces. Dripping water created a rhythmic sound, making the puddle grow.

Locations.Name: Parking East 2
Locations.Description: In a dimly lit parking lot with spaced cars, a mysterious man in a long leather jacket and wide hat moved strangely, making people curious and uneasy in the quiet night.

Locations.Name: Parking East 3
Locations.Description: Cars near the exit promised a quick getaway. A breeze from outside contrasted with the garage's stale air. A big oil spill on the ground looked menacing, reminding you to stay alert, even as you headed for the distant exit.

Locations.Name: Parking West 1
Locations.Description: Bright lights illuminated parked cars, their shiny exteriors reflecting the artificial glow. The lot was full, and drivers searched for spots with strained patience.

Locations.Name: Parking West 2
Locations.Description: A dusty grey Mazda was parked there, offering comfort after a long day. The parking area had faded lines and dim lights, with faint sounds of others nearby, creating a quiet atmosphere in this underground corner.

Locations.Name: Parking West 3
Locations.Description: In a quieter parking area with a few cars, there was litter on the ground like cups, paper, and wrappers. The concrete floor showed signs of wear from shoes, indicating it was a temporary spot.
